page.title: 08THE O.K. CAFE'S DAY.
page.content: The owner of the O.K. Cafe gets up at 5:45 a.m.and starts serving customers at 6:30 a.m,finishing at 9:30 a.m.She has been doing this job for four and a half years.The food is always fresh and includes eggs,bacon,sausages,and bubble and squeak.At 11:30 a.m she starts serving dinner;items such as meat pie,sausages,vegetables and casseroles.She does a lot of cooking in the morning; making pastry, cakes,flans, etc she uses a big heavy duty electric mixer for pastry.Dinners are served until half past two and then she looks after her little girl.The menu will always be varied for customers.If somebody wants beans instead of sausages for example,then this is arranged .All the vegetables are cooked in the morning and then the meals are put in the microwave oven as they are required.
